title: Relaxed Luxury Living
posting_body: Centrally located on 121 between Lewisville, The Colony, and Hebron, this property offers luxury living in a relaxed atmosphere.
Lounge at the resort style pool, play billiards in the state-of-the-art community room, or stay fit in the fully-equipped athletic center.
If getting out is your preference,  you are minutes from Frisco, Plano, Dallas or Denton with endless shopping, dining and nightlife opportunities.
EXACTLY where YOU want to be.
Call or text Spirit Real Estate Group at
and refer to property code LFM-VCH-1 for more information.
We are one of the premier locating services in Dallas.
Let us help you find your dream apartment!
Price and availability subject to change without prior notification.
